name: Space Shooter (itch) (Shoebox Games)
description:
Space Shooter

The galaxy is being invaded by UFOs!

Destroy your adversaries and get to the far reaches of the galaxy!

A top-down space shooter with 10 levels to play.

---

Arrow Keys - Movement

Spacebar - Fire/Shoot

---

Art assets, gameplay and coding all done by Shoebox Games.

Game is meant to be played in browser, not in full-screen mode.

You can find our other titles at: https://shoebox-games.itch.io/
